description:
The apartment is close to Metropolitan Museum of Art, 
Guggenheim , Central Park, Subways, Neue Galerie New York. 

Comfortable bed, cable, wifi, desk for working and high ceilings. Apartment is great for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

The entire apartment!

Tons of restaurants, bars and shopping down the street. Grocery stores, 24 hour pharmacies, etc.

The apartment is a 2 minute walk door-to-door to the 4, 5, 6 subway trains. Also, the cross town bus is a 2 minute walk as well. Very easy to get to the west side or downtown.
name: Great 1 bedroom full Apartment!
review: The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
